message: Initialize v8.8.3

Comment out warnings that no normal user can understand. Add suggestions.

Merge branch 'release-8.8' of gitlab:trunk/abinit into release-8.8
Slight modif of the comment.
Suppress bot references that are no more nightly tested (or in the on-demand pool). They are not certified anymore...

Merge branch 'release-8.8' of gitlab.abinit.org:trunk/abinit into release-8.8
